data.name: Volcanion

attacks.name: Power Heater
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to each of those Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.

data.name: Volcanion-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Steam Up
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, during this turn, your Basic Fire Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Volcanion

attacks.name: Flare Starter
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If you go second and it's your first turn, instead search for up to 3 Fire Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: High-Heat Blast
attacks.text: If you have at least 4 Fire Energy in play, this attack does 60 more damage.

data.flavorText: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It's said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.

data.name: Volcanion ◇
rules: ◇ (Prism Star) Rule: You can't have more than 1 ◇ card with the same name in your deck. If a ◇ card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.

abilities.name: Jet Geyser
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Water Energy card from your hand. If you do, your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sauna Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.

data.name: Shining Volcanion

attacks.name: Dual Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Quad Smash
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

data.flavorText: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It's said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.

data.name: Volcanion-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Steam Up
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, during this turn, your Basic Fire Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Volcanic Heat
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Concentrated Fire
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Combustion Impact
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Water Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

data.name: Volcanion ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Scalding Steam
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Burned.

attacks.name: Scorching Cyclone
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
